articles.author: R. Loheswar
articles.title: Report: Demand for KL-Singapore flight tickets spiking following announcement of VTL - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, Nov 10 — Flight bookings between Kuala Lumpur-Singapore shot up immediately after the two South-east Asian countries rolled back Covid-19 travel curbs yesterday. Straits Times cited travel platforms saying that bookings rose despite the lack of …
articles.content:
Malaysia and Singapore will allow quarantine-free travel between both countries for individuals fully inoculated against Covid-19 at the end of this month. Picture by Ahmad Zamzahuri
KUALA LUMPUR, N… [+2212 chars]

articles.title: 4 Asiatic lions at Night Safari test positive for Covid-19 after exposure to infected staff - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Four Asiatic lions at the Night Safari have tested positive for Covid-19 after being exposed to staff members from Mandai Wildlife Group who were infected with the coronavirus.

articles.author: hermesauto
articles.title: Mastercard launches buy now, pay later card for SMEs in Asia - The Straits Times
articles.description: The consumer-oriented BNPL industry is set to exceed $1.35 trillion in annual gross merchandise volume by 2025.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: SINGAPORE (THE BUSINESS TIMES) - Mastercard has launched a buy now, pay later (BNPL) commercial card to provide more flexible financing options for small businesses in the Asia-Pacific, riding on the… [+2106 chars]
